ModMetaData.name: [RH] Faction: The Ghosts
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
Officially known as Task Force: STALKER.
A mysterious group of masked warriors arrive in this Rim planet with no official ties to any country, government or organization. They're Ghosts, fighting for something that can't be killed.
Credits to: Saito Yui - TraderKinds.xml coding assistance Mehni - 1.1 backpacks.dll update Forestfey - German Shepherd texture! Ods and BajtMe - For help with awesome apparel textures Jecrell, Jdalt40, dninemfive and Spdskatr - For C# coding assistance and patches
